es.ucm.fdi.tp.base.model

Interface GamePlayer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AiPlayer, ConsolePlayer, RandomPlayer, SmartPlayer

    public interface GamePlayer
    A player of games. Can generate game actions to apply on the game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName() 
      int getPlayerNumber()
      returns the number assigned to the player when joining the game (-1 if not joined yet)
      void join(int playerNumber)
      joins this player to a game.

      demands a move from the player.
